about.me: We are a fresh and innovative stake pool focusing on running this service in a responsible way.
about.server: Hybrid Cloud Setup: 4 Relay, 1 Validator + 1 Standby Validator with automated failover, each 8 Core, 32-24 GB RAM, Properly hardened (Firewall, Node only internal network, SSH Public Key Only, no Root User, VPN only maintenance access) and monitored (Availability, Sync latency, Mail and SMS Alerting)
